name: L1-S0N
description:
You play as L1-S0N, an exploration robot whose purpose is discovering ancient ruins.

To progress further, you will have to find three runic stones similar to the ones located near landmarks and activate them to push the cursed fog downwards.

Be careful though, as you go down, so does the lethal fog above you. You might want to plan your journey ahead !


Controls :

  • WASD / ZQSD : Movement
  • Spacebar : Jump / Jetpack (Held)
  • Left click (Held) : Interact with pedestals
  • Right click : Toggle zoom state
